Name: SarcasmSupremeMemeLo
Text: My therapist told me to embrace my mistakes. So I just bought a lifetime supply of glitter.

Comments.Name: MemeSnarker
Comments.Text: Wow, a post so deep even my Wi-Fi couldn’t connect to it.

Comments.Name: ChaoticVibe_48
Comments.Text: Looks like they forgot to include the main point—interesting how much can be left unsaid sometimes.
